events.message: The customer reported an auto accident involving a collision with another vehicle on a rainy afternoon.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to the nature of the incident described.
An agent with expertise in auto claims was assigned promptly to address this vehicle collision case.
The claimant was notified that their auto accident claim has been received and is now under review.
The agent requested photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and driver's license for verification.
The claimant submitted all requested documents including detailed photos and the official accident report.
The investigation team began reviewing submitted evidence and contacted witnesses for statements.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the claimant is not at fault in the vehicle collision.
A fair settlement covering repair costs and rental vehicle expenses was proposed to the claimant.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the quick resolution and professionalism of the handling process.
The claim was officially approved by the claims manager following the final assessment.
Payment for the approved settlement was issued directly to the claimant's bank account without delay.
The auto accident claim was closed after successful payment and customer confirmation of receipt.
